entry.name: AstraMilitarum/CentaurDescription
entry.value: Light utility vehicle mainly used to speed up transport of troops and artillery. Weak but allows for rapid deployment.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/CentaurFlavor
entry.value: The Centaur is a lightly-armoured, open-top transport that primarily tows artillery, notably used by the Death Korps of Krieg. The gunner mans a Heavy Stubber to look pretty, and troops can cram themselves into the hold for transport, though the over-sized twin engines and power pack makes the ride uncomfortable. As the old Terran saying goes, 'Tactics win battles; logistics win wars.'
